text: What is your target market segment and customer profile?
help_text: e.g., B2B enterprise, B2C consumers, SMB startups

text: What is your estimated market size and growth rate?
Who are your main competitors and what is your differentiation?
help_text: e.g., cost leadership, feature parity, unique IP
example_answer: Competitors: Salesforce, HubSpot; Differentiation: AI-powered insights

text: What is your pricing model and revenue strategy?
What is your projected revenue and profitability timeline?
help_text: e.g., $1M ARR by year 2, breakeven in 18 months

text: What funding strategy will you pursue?
help_text: e.g., bootstrapped, seed funding, Series A, corporate
example_answer: Seed round $2M, then Series A $10M in year 2

text: What are your key KPIs and success metrics?
help_text: e.g., CAC, LTV, retention rate, NPS, churn
e.g., direct sales, channel partners, self-serve, community
example_answer: Self-serve freemium + direct sales for enterprise

text: What is your customer acquisition and retention plan?
help_text: e.g., content marketing, partnerships, referral programs
example_answer: Content marketing (SEO), partner integrations, referral rewards

text: What is your organizational structure and team plan?
help_text: e.g., founding team, hiring plan, board composition

text: What is your key talent and expertise gap?
help_text: e.g., sales expertise, ML/AI engineers, operations
example_answer: Need experienced VP Sales, data science talent

text: What are your key business risks and mitigation strategies?
help_text: e.g., market risk, execution risk, competitive risk
example_answer: Market risk: validate with 100 customers before launch

text: What are your regulatory and compliance requirements?
help_text: e.g., SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA, export controls
example_answer: GDPR compliant, planning SOC 2 Type II in Year 2

text: What is your long-term vision and exit strategy?
help_text: e.g., IPO, acquisition target, sustainable business, category leader
example_answer: Build category leader, likely acquisition target for enterprise platform
